192.168.10.0/24
11000000.10101000.00001010.00000000

LAN Vendas: 20 hosts
20+2 = 22
2^5= 32
32-5 = /27
REDE
11000000.10101000.00001010.001|00000
192.168.10.0/27
BROADCAST
11000000.10101000.00001010.000|11111
192.168.10.31/27
ENDEREÇO PC
192.168.10.1/27
GATEWAY
192.168.10.30/27
MASK
255.255.255.224


LAN Recursos Humanos: 10 hosts
10+2 = 12
2^4 = 16
32-4 = /28
REDE
11000000.10101000.00001010.0010|0000
192.168.10.32/28
BROADCAST
11000000.10101000.00001010.0010|1111
192.168.10.47/28
ENDEREÇO PC
192.168.10.33/28
GATEWAY
192.168.10.46/28
MASK
255.255.255.240


LAN Administração: 5 hosts
5+2 = 7
2^3 = 8
32-3 = /29

Os demas enderecos dos Router e do Main-server serao a partir do 192.168.10.100
